channel.title: Sword Art Online RSPS
channel.description:
Slight Change: Instead of just making the game like finish floors and proceed to next floor i guess i will make a seperate home and a seperate minigame the server will still be based on Sword Art Online But not completely so once a person has finished a floor they can go to the next one but cannot come back
Story Line: Just Like Any Other Server this one will have monsters, skills, and shops but After watching Sword Art Online i wanted to make a server kinda of similiar to it =D Basically there will be a home with shops and such but! those shops will not have any rare items so to get those rare items like claws a person must reach high lvl floors i will create like a minigame except it wont be Mini! it will have about 30+ floors and each floor will give you a reward for example you finished floor 10 by killing the final boss (tormented Demon) as a reward you get dragon claws =D this server will have PVP so its not as boring and will have other minigames like Barrows and such
Update : Floor 1 Almost Done i will upload pictures soon Floors are going to be Character Rights based Removed all Racist shit from source
Bug: if anyone has a 562 Loading 602 Client that has working auto cache download can you please help me? i cant seem to get mine to download the cache from dropbox thanks =D
Note: if the person wants to repeat any floor for the reward again they must start all over again and cannot return to the floor they had previously went to so if you were at floor 30 and kill floor 1 boss again and unlock the door you cant go back to floor 30 .-.

item.title: Sword Art Online RSPS
item.dc:creator: @aciraccar aciraccar
item.description:
@aciraccar wrote:

Its based on a anime not dungeoneering and i wont use dungeneering maps either ill use large maps and hide the boss their .-. just watch the anime youl figure it out 0.0
but in the anime once you die your dead XD ill just remove that part
EDIT: Just wait til im done like the first 4 floors ill upload pictures

item.title: Sword Art Online RSPS
item.dc:creator: @aciraccar aciraccar
item.description:
@aciraccar wrote:

Slight Change: Instead of just making the game like finish floors and proceed to next floor i guess i will make a seperate home and a seperate minigame the server will still be based on Sword Art Online But not completely so once a person has finished a floor they can go to the next one but cannot come back

Story Line: Just Like Any Other Server this one will have monsters, skills, and shops but
After watching Sword Art Online i wanted to make a server kinda of similiar to it =D
Basically there will be a home with shops and such but! those shops will not have any rare items so to get those rare items like claws a person must reach high lvl floors i will create like a minigame except it wont be Mini! it will have about 30+ floors and each floor will give you a reward for example you finished floor 10 by killing the final boss (tormented Demon) as a reward you get dragon claws =D
this server will have PVP so its not as boring and will have other minigames like Barrows and such

Update : Floor 1 Almost Done i will upload pictures soon
Floors are going to be Character Rights based
Removed all Racist shit from source

Bug: if anyone has a 562 Loading 602 Client that has working auto cache download can you please help me? i cant seem to get mine to download the cache from dropbox thanks =D

Note: if the person wants to repeat any floor for the reward again they must start all over again and cannot return to the floor they had previously went to so if you were at floor 30 and kill floor 1 boss again and unlock the door you cant go back to floor 30 .-.
